snippet: Friday’s highlights from around the web include images of a gracefully designed building that was once a major center of scientific research, which now sits silent and empty. Plus, Paul Graham on women start-up founders — and how to encourage...
abstract: Friday’s highlights from around the web include images of a gracefully designed building that was once a major center of scientific research, which now sits silent and empty. Plus, Paul Graham on women start-up founders — and how to encourage more girls to consider programming

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Inside Bell Labs' Carcass, and Encouraging Women Programmers
